title: I have a PBE account, can someone tell me how to download the client since I got a new computer?
body: I just want to know where to download the client. Thank you!

replies.body: Congrats on getting into the PBE!  The download link for the PC version of the PBE client is available [here](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/PBE_Client_Shell.zip).  Make sure to go over our in-depth [PBE Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) in preperation of helping to test!  Have fun!
